name: Summer Camp 2013
description: Experience in working in a professional environment. Work on IPTV projects and design of IPTV applications.

name: Student Job
description:
* Native Android application development with high focus on Google services and GCM push messages.
* Java server application powered by Jersey REST framework.
* Creating of versioning software for organizing and storage of management information base (MIB) files.
* Consisting of designing MySQL database and PHP import and versioning scripts.
* Designing Phonegap mobile application with backend server and GCM push message functionality. Biggest challenge was achieving look and feel of Ericsson applications.

name: Front End Web Developer
description:
* Implementing the front page and login capabilities.
* Updating the app to use AngularJS.

name: Lead Front End Web Developer / System Administrator
description:
**Arazoo single page web application:**
* Web application used by building professionals for product discovery, project management, firm and project collaboration
* Front end created using modern web technologies: React, Redux, SASS, CSS modules, Babel, Webpack
* Front end testing done with Jest and Selenium
* Backend using Scala and Elastic Search

**Arazoo browser plugin:**
* Plugin used by Arazoo members for adding new products from the web to Arazoo
* Created using same technologies as the SPA

**My tasks:**
* Core team member from the start
* Lead front end developer
* Front end testing, both manual and writing of automatic tests
* Collaboration on design and implementation of new features
* Mentoring of new team members
* Working remotely

name: Founder
description: Founder and CEO of a small web development company
